languages.text: "Лорд-капитан?"{n} Голос Мастера вокса предательски подрагивает.{/n} "Мне доложили, что стрельба на нижней палубе прекратилась. Полагаю, вы смогли взять ситуацию под контроль. Жду ваших дальнейших распоряжений".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан?"{n} Голос Вокс-мастера предательски подрагивает.{/n} "Мне доложили, что стрельба на нижней палубе прекратилась. Полагаю, вы смогли взять ситуацию под контроль. Жду ваших дальнейших распоряжений".

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан?"{n} Голос Мастера вокса предательски подрагивает.{/n} "Мне доложили, что стрельба на нижней палубе прекратилась. Полагаю, вы смогли взять ситуацию под контроль. Жду ваших дальнейших распоряжений".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

languages.text: “舰长大人？”{n}音阵大师的声音不同寻常地颤抖着。{/n}“我收到了报告，说下层甲板上的枪击已经停止了。我猜测您已经控制住了局势，我将等待您进一步的指示。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人？”{n}音阵大师的声音不同寻常地颤抖着。{/n}“我收到了报告，说下层甲板上的枪击已经停止了。我猜测您已经控制住了局势，我将等待您进一步的指示。”

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos tiembla, revelando su preocupación.{/n} «Según el último informe, han cesado los disparos en la cubierta inferior. Asumo que ha controlado la situación. Quedo a la espera de nuevas instrucciones».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

traits.locale_text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos tiembla, revelando su preocupación.{/n} «Según el último informe, han cesado los disparos en la cubierta inferior. Asumo que ha controlado la situación. Quedo a la espera de nuevas instrucciones».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声が裏切り者のように震えていた。{/n}「下層デッキでの銃撃がやんだとの報告を受けました。状況はコントロール下に置かれたものと推察します。さらなる指示をお待ちしております」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声が裏切り者のように震えていた。{/n}「下層デッキでの銃撃がやんだとの報告を受けました。状況はコントロール下に置かれたものと推察します。さらなる指示をお待ちしております」

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Die Stimme der Voxmeisterin zittert verräterisch.{/n} "Ich habe einen Bericht erhalten, wonach auf dem Unterdeck nicht mehr geschossen wird. Ich vermute, Ihr habt die Situation unter Kontrolle gebracht. Erwarte weitere Anweisungen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Die Stimme der Voxmeisterin zittert verräterisch.{/n} "Ich habe einen Bericht erhalten, wonach auf dem Unterdeck nicht mehr geschossen wird. Ich vermute, Ihr habt die Situation unter Kontrolle gebracht. Erwarte weitere Anweisungen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}La voix tremblante de la maîtresse-vox trahit son trouble.{/n} « Un rapport m'informe que la fusillade sur le pont inférieur est terminée. J'en déduis que vous avez repris le contrôle de la situation. J'attends vos instructions. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}La voix tremblante de la maîtresse-vox trahit son trouble.{/n} « Un rapport m'informe que la fusillade sur le pont inférieur est terminée. J'en déduis que vous avez repris le contrôle de la situation. J'attends vos instructions. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Vox Üstadı'nın sesi haince titriyor.{/n} "Alt güvertedeki silahlı çatışmanın durduğunu bildiren bir rapor aldım. Durumu kontrol altına aldığınızı sanıyorum. Talimat bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice shakes traitorously.{/n} "I received a report that the shooting on the lower deck had stopped. I presume you have brought the situation under control. Awaiting further instructions."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Vox Üstadı'nın sesi haince titriyor.{/n} "Alt güvertedeki silahlı çatışmanın durduğunu bildiren bir rapor aldım. Durumu kontrol altına aldığınızı sanıyorum. Talimat bekliyorum."
